mapper.sql: id, code, name, name_short, name_en, type, province, city, county, subdistrict, address, zipcode, fax, tel, website, email, contact_person, contact_person_tel, legal_person, bank_name, account_no, tax_no, enable, sort, description, create_by, create_time, modify_by, modify_time, row_version, row_valid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_supplier ( id, code, name, name_short, name_en, type, province, city, county, subdistrict, address, zipcode, fax, tel, website, email, contact_person, contact_person_tel, legal_person, bank_name, account_no, tax_no, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{code}, #{name}, #{nameShort}, #{nameEn}, #{type}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{subdistrict}, #{address}, #{zipcode}, #{fax}, #{tel}, #{website}, #{email}, #{contactPerson}, #{contactPersonTel}, #{legalPerson}, #{bankName}, #{accountNo}, #{taxNo}, #{enable}, #{sort}, #{description}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{modifyBy}, 1, 1 )

INSERT INTO tb_supplier ( id, code, name, name_short, name_en, type, province, city, county, subdistrict, address, zipcode, fax, tel, website, email, contact_person, contact_person_tel, legal_person, bank_name, account_no, tax_no, enable, sort, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.code}, #{item.name}, #{item.nameShort}, #{item.nameEn}, #{item.type}, #{item.province}, #{item.city}, #{item.county}, #{item.subdistrict}, #{item.address}, #{item.zipcode}, #{item.fax}, #{item.tel}, #{item.website}, #{item.email}, #{item.contactPerson}, #{item.contactPersonTel}, #{item.legalPerson}, #{item.bankName}, #{item.accountNo}, #{item.taxNo}, #{item.enable}, #{item.sort}, #{item.description}, now(), #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.modifyBy}, 1, 1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_supplier t SET
t.code = #{code},
t.name = #{name},
t.name_short = #{nameShort},
t.name_en = #{nameEn},
t.type = #{type},
t.province = #{province},
t.city = #{city},
t.county = #{county},
t.subdistrict = #{subdistrict},
t.address = #{address},
t.zipcode = #{zipcode},
t.fax = #{fax},
t.tel = #{tel},
t.website = #{website},
t.email = #{email},
t.contact_person = #{contactPerson},
t.contact_person_tel = #{contactPersonTel},
t.legal_person = #{legalPerson},
t.bank_name = #{bankName},
t.account_no = #{accountNo},
t.tax_no = #{taxNo},
t.enable = #{enable},
t.sort = #{sort},
t.description = #{description},
t.modify_by = #{modifyBy},
t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_supplier t SET t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now(), t.row_valid = 0 WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_supplier t WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_supplier t WHERE t.id = #{value} AND t.row_valid = 1
SELECT FROM tb_supplier t WHERE t.row_valid = 1 AND t.code = #{code} LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_supplier t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
